edu.umd.cs.psl.model.kernel

Interface GroundKernel

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GroundCompatibilityKernel, GroundConstraintKernel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGroundRule, GroundCompatibilityRule, GroundConstraintRule, GroundDomainRangeConstraint, GroundEmptySetDefinition, GroundLinearConstraint, GroundLogLoss, GroundSetDefinition, GroundSymmetryConstraint, GroundValueConstraint, GroundWeightedCompatibilityRule, LDAgroundLogLoss, LossAugmentingGroundKernel

    public interface GroundKernel
    A function that either constrains or measures the compatibility of the truth values of GroundAtoms.

    GroundKernels are templated by a parent Kernel.

    • Method Summary

      Something about whether GroundAtoms can be removed from this GroundKernel if they have truth value of 0.0...

      Notifies this GroundKernel that the parameterization of its parent Kernel has changed.

        Notifies this GroundKernel that the parameterization of its parent Kernel has changed.
        Returns:
